Articles.Content:
Hi Everyone.

New to KSP but enjoying it very much and after playing around in sandbox mode i'm now trying to have fun in Career mode.

after shifting throu WiKi and the message board and youtube videos my question is this.

how the heck do you get to take Surface samples, when i EVA and right click the Kerbal i only get the EVA Report option :/ Do i need to upgrade Buildings?? (Research & Development)

regards

Kasper

/* EDIT

Figured it out, just had to read the upgrade messages in-game for the Building *I'm with stupid*

*/

Edited December 22, 2014 by Kystol
Yes. Surface sampling is only available after upgrading the R & D facility in career mode.

Yes. Surface sampling is only available after upgrading the R & D facility in career mode.

You also need to upgrade the Astronaut Complex.
